content: this is crochet summer top works up in less than an hour it is very beginner friendly it makes use of simple crochet stitches like single_crochet it is a halter top it is also backless and it is heart shaped this pattern has a video tutorial on youtube available via the link below https //youtu be/fwogrslifgi si=s_-reubqqdrsecgb materials dk weight yarn 5 0 mm crochet hook stitch marker **buy more save more no codes needed get 10% discount when you purchase 2 patterns at once get 15% discount when you purchase 3 patterns at once get 20% discount when you purchase 4 patterns at once get 25% discount when you purchase 5 patterns at once get 40% discount when you purchase 10 or more patterns at once** this pattern has been thoroughly tested this is a pdf pattern and not a finished product it is a copyright issue of toyslab creations you are free to sell whatever you make from this pattern but you can t sell share or modify part or all of the pattern if you have any questions about the pattern contact me via email happy crocheting
